ModMetaData.name: LMC005.更好的物品制造与作物种植界面
ModMetaData.author: Dubwise
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 在生产界面添加了新的UI界面，带有搜索界面，在许多MOD运行的情况下使寻找物品变得简便，可以自定义界面的大小，直接点击物品即可加入生产队列。 This mod adds new list boxes for adding bills, health bills, selecting plants for growing zones and building, making it easier to find things when lots of mods are running, and you can also view the info tab with just a mouse over.\nv1.0.141
